sqlMap.insert:
/* dwgInfoDAO.insertDwgInfo */ /* DWG_INFO 등록 */
INSERT INTO DWG_INFO ( MCO /* DWG_INFO.관리기관 */ , ROAD_NO /* DWG_INFO.노선_번호 */ , SECT /* DWG_INFO.구간_번호 */ , HCODE /* DWG_INFO.이력_코드 */ , SECT_ST /* DWG_INFO.도면_시점 */ , SECT_ED /* DWG_INFO.도면_종점 */ , DWG_LEN /* DWG_INFO.도면_연장 */ , DWG_NAME /* DWG_INFO.도면_명 */ , CON_NAME /* DWG_INFO.구간_도면_명 */ , LOCAT /* DWG_INFO.법정동_위치 */ , DIV_ROAD_NO /* DWG_INFO.분기_도로_번호 */ , BY_DWG_NAME /* DWG_INFO.분기_도로_인접_도면_명 */ , BYPASS /* DWG_INFO.우회도로_유무 */ , INPUT_DATE /* DWG_INFO.입력일 */ , DWG_GUBN /* DWG_INFO.도면_구분 */ , REM /* DWG_INFO.비고 */ , SEQID /* DWG_INFO.SEQID */ ) VALUES ( #MCO# /* DWG_INFO.관리기관 */ , #ROAD_NO# /* DWG_INFO.노선_번호 */ , #SECT# /* DWG_INFO.구간_번호 */ , #HCODE# /* DWG_INFO.이력_코드 */ , #SECT_ST# /* DWG_INFO.도면_시점 */ , #SECT_ED# /* DWG_INFO.도면_종점 */ , #DWG_LEN# /* DWG_INFO.도면_연장 */ , #DWG_NAME# /* DWG_INFO.도면_명 */ , #CON_NAME# /* DWG_INFO.구간_도면_명 */ , #LOCAT# /* DWG_INFO.법정동_위치 */ , #DIV_ROAD_NO# /* DWG_INFO.분기_도로_번호 */ , #BY_DWG_NAME# /* DWG_INFO.분기_도로_인접_도면_명 */ , #BYPASS# /* DWG_INFO.우회도로_유무 */ , #INPUT_DATE# /* DWG_INFO.입력일 */ , #DWG_GUBN# /* DWG_INFO.도면_구분 */ , #REM# /* DWG_INFO.비고 */ , #SEQID# /* DWG_INFO.SEQID */ )
sqlMap.update: /* dwgInfoDAO.updateDwgInfo */ /* DWG_INFO 수정 */ UPDATE DWG_INFO SET MCO = #MCO# /* DWG_INFO.관리기관 */ , ROAD_NO = #ROAD_NO# /* DWG_INFO.노선_번호 */ , SECT = #SECT# /* DWG_INFO.구간_번호 */ , HCODE = #HCODE# /* DWG_INFO.이력_코드 */ , SECT_ST = #SECT_ST# /* DWG_INFO.도면_시점 */ , SECT_ED = #SECT_ED# /* DWG_INFO.도면_종점 */ , DWG_LEN = #DWG_LEN# /* DWG_INFO.도면_연장 */ , DWG_NAME = #DWG_NAME# /* DWG_INFO.도면_명 */ , CON_NAME = #CON_NAME# /* DWG_INFO.구간_도면_명 */ , LOCAT = #LOCAT# /* DWG_INFO.법정동_위치 */ , DIV_ROAD_NO = #DIV_ROAD_NO# /* DWG_INFO.분기_도로_번호 */ , BY_DWG_NAME = #BY_DWG_NAME# /* DWG_INFO.분기_도로_인접_도면_명 */ , BYPASS = #BYPASS# /* DWG_INFO.우회도로_유무 */ , INPUT_DATE = #INPUT_DATE# /* DWG_INFO.입력일 */ , DWG_GUBN = #DWG_GUBN# /* DWG_INFO.도면_구분 */ , REM = #REM# /* DWG_INFO.비고 */ , SEQID = #SEQID# /* DWG_INFO.SEQID */
sqlMap.select: /* dwgInfoDAO.selectDwgInfo */ /* DWG_INFO 조회 */ SELECT dwginfo.MCO /* DWG_INFO.관리기관 */ , dwginfo.ROAD_NO /* DWG_INFO.노선_번호 */ , dwginfo.SECT /* DWG_INFO.구간_번호 */ , dwginfo.HCODE /* DWG_INFO.이력_코드 */ , dwginfo.SECT_ST /* DWG_INFO.도면_시점 */ , dwginfo.SECT_ED /* DWG_INFO.도면_종점 */ , dwginfo.DWG_LEN /* DWG_INFO.도면_연장 */ , dwginfo.DWG_NAME /* DWG_INFO.도면_명 */ , dwginfo.CON_NAME /* DWG_INFO.구간_도면_명 */ , dwginfo.LOCAT /* DWG_INFO.법정동_위치 */ , dwginfo.DIV_ROAD_NO /* DWG_INFO.분기_도로_번호 */ , dwginfo.BY_DWG_NAME /* DWG_INFO.분기_도로_인접_도면_명 */ , dwginfo.BYPASS /* DWG_INFO.우회도로_유무 */ , dwginfo.INPUT_DATE /* DWG_INFO.입력일 */ , dwginfo.DWG_GUBN /* DWG_INFO.도면_구분 */ , dwginfo.REM /* DWG_INFO.비고 */ , dwginfo.SEQID /* DWG_INFO.SEQID */ FROM DWG_INFO dwginfo

/* dwgInfoDAO.selectDwgInfoListTotalCount */ /* DWG_INFO 목록 개수 조회 */ SELECT COUNT(*) AS totCnt FROM DWG_INFO dwginfo
AND COALESCE(dwginfo.SEQID,0) = COALESCE( (SELECT MAX(dwg.SEQID) FROM DWG_INFO dwg WHERE dwg.ROAD_NO = dwginfo.ROAD_NO AND dwg.SECT = dwginfo.SECT AND dwg.DWG_NAME = dwginfo.DWG_NAME),0 )
/* dwgInfoDAO.selectDwgInfoSectList */ /* DWG_INFO 구간 목록 조회 */ SELECT SECT FROM DWG_INFO WHERE ROAD_NO = #ROAD_NO# GROUP BY SECT ORDER BY SECT
